message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL 

The paper proposes a method for accelerating stochastic optimization in deep neural networks, which is a common problem in machine learning. The paper specifically focuses on image classification and language modeling tasks using deep convolutional and recurrent neural networks, which are subfields of computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The method also involves importance sampling, which is a common technique in machine learning optimization (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of biased gradient estimates, which is a topic in neural network optimization (cs.NE) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
